meanings.sent1: I will pluralize the word 'cat' to 'cats' in my sentence.
meanings.sent2: She always pluralizes nouns correctly in her writing.
meanings.sent3: Why did the grammar teacher pluralize the word 'moose' to 'mooses'?
meanings.sent4: Her kindness seemed to pluralize, spreading to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The magician's spell caused the flowers to pluralize into a beautiful garden.
